org.athrun.android.framework
类 ViewOperation

java.lang.Object
  org.athrun.android.framework.ViewOperation

public class ViewOperation
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains MotionEvent methods. Examples are drag() & clickOnScreen().

作者：
bingyang.djj

嵌套类摘要
static class ViewOperation.Direction

clickOnScreen

public void clickOnScreen(float x,
                          float y)
Clicks on a given coordinate on the screen.

参数：
x - the x coordinate
y - the y coordinate

                              float y,
                              int time)
                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Long clicks a given coordinate on the screen

参数：
x - the x coordinate
y - the y coordinate
抛出：
java.lang.InterruptedException

drag

public void drag(float fromX,
                 float toX,
                 float fromY,
                 float toY,
                 int stepCount)
Simulate touching a specific location and dragging to a new location.

This method was copied from TouchUtils.java in the Android Open Source Project, and modified here.

参数：
fromX - X coordinate of the initial touch, in screen coordinates
toX - Xcoordinate of the drag destination, in screen coordinates
fromY - X coordinate of the initial touch, in screen coordinates
toY - Y coordinate of the drag destination, in screen coordinates
stepCount - How many move steps to include in the drag. If you want to perform quick velocity, make this value smaller.

monkeyClick

public static void monkeyClick(int x,
                               int y)
Clicks on a given coordinate on the screen.

参数：
x - x coordinate
y - y coordinate

longClickAndDrag

public void longClickAndDrag(float fromX,
                             float toX,
                             float fromY,
                             float toY,
                             int stepCount)
Simulate touching a specific location and dragging to a new location.

This method was copied from TouchUtils.java in the Android Open Source Project, and modified here.

参数：
fromX - X coordinate of the initial touch, in screen coordinates
toX - Xcoordinate of the drag destination, in screen coordinates
fromY - X coordinate of the initial touch, in screen coordinates
toY - Y coordinate of the drag destination, in screen coordinates
stepCount - How many move steps to include in the drag. If you want to perform quick velocity, make this value smaller.
抛出：
